item.title: Orbi Hacking
item.description: Intro I have been watching some hardware hacking videos on YouTube recently and wanted to try for it myself. I found two old routers labeled “Orbi.” After looking them up, I found that one is the router and the other is called the “satellite” which to my understanding is just another access point. Neither of them were in use, They also hadn’t been updated in a while which made them perfect to try hardware hacking for the first time.
